job_title: Django Developer with Open edX Expertise
job_description: Job descriptionAs a Python/Django developer, you will get an opportunity to work on web applications used by millions of users every day. You will be working with a highly skilled team of other developers who love to design, write, test, and maintain high-quality code.Responsibilities• Effectively communicate with a technical development team.• Work efficiently to accomplish assigned tasks within an appropri...ate and aggressively estimated turnaround time with a high level of quality.• Document all new development and code change for developers (technical documentation) as well as clients (functional documentation).• Provide assistance to the development team with tasks that belong to servers and Web products.• Conduct load testing and code optimizations to improve application performance and throughput.• Maintain and enhance the code used to build and deploy management.Qualification & Experience• BS in Computer Science or similar degree• 3+ Years in Python (Django)Must have requirements• Experience working with the following technologies: Python, AWS, Django REST Framework, Django-CMS, Flask.• Practical RDBMS experience (preferably PostgreSQL). Solid SQL knowledge and ability to design effective data storage for the task at hand, query performance optimization skills.• Linux-based development experience.• Experience with performance optimization, scaling, event analytics.• Write and maintain functional and unit tests for automated testing and deployment.Nice to have requirement• Knowledge of fabric scripts for deployment on Linux instances.• Experience on AWS or other cloud-based infrastructure providers.• Experience with caching and key-value store storage services.• Extensive experience with JavaScript (especially jQuery) and Ajax.• Experience with any templating engine with HTML and CSS.• Experience with modern Social APIs for login, email, analytics, etc.• Experience of working on agile/scrum based environment.We offer:• Market Competitive Salary.• Medical (Immediate Family).• ESOP Plan for permanent employees.• GratuityLocation: Karachi (On-Site)

Job descriptionJob Description:Django Developer with Open edX ExpertisePosition Title: Django Developer (Open edX Specialist)Location: KarachiEmployment Type: [Full-time/Part-time/Contract]Experience Level: 1+ years of Open edX experienceApply Now: hr@alnafi.edu.pkAbout the RoleWe are seeking a skilled Django Developer with at least 1 year of expertise in Open edX to join our dynamic team. The id...eal candidate will be responsible for developing, customizing, and maintaining Open edX platforms to deliver world-class learning experiences. If you are passionate about EdTech and have a strong background in Django development, this is an excellent opportunity to make an impact.Key Responsibilities● Open edX Development: Customize and extend Open edX platforms, including its core components (LMS, CMS/Studio). ● Integration & APIs: Design and implement integrations with third-party tools, APIs, and services to enhance platform functionality. ● Backend Development: Develop scalable, efficient backend solutions using Django, Python, and related technologies. ● Theming & Branding: Customize Open edX themes to align with client branding requirements. ● Deployment & Maintenance: Deploy Open edX instances on cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) or on-premises environments and provide ongoing support. ● Bug Fixing & Performance Optimization: Diagnose and resolve issues, optimize the platform for better performance. ● Collaboration: Work closely with product managers, instructional designers, and other developers to implement solutions tailored to business needs. ● Documentation: Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation of code, processes, and workflows.Required Qualifications● Experience: Minimum 1 years of hands-on experience working with Open edX. ● Technical Skills:○ Proficiency in Django, Python, and RESTful API development. ○ Solid understanding of the Open edX architecture and key components (LMS, CMS). ○ Experience with database systems like MySQL, PostgreSQL. ○ Familiarity with frontend technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, React/Angular is a plus). ○ Knowledge of containerization tools like Docker and orchestration platforms like Kubernetes. ○ Familiarity with deploying and managing Open edX platforms on cloud services. ● Problem-Solving: Strong analytical and debugging skills. ● Version Control: Proficiency in Git and version control workflows. ● Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills.Preferred Qualifications● Familiarity with Open edX plugins, XBlocks development, and microservices. ● Understanding of SCORM and LTI standards for course content. ● Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automated testing.What We Offer ●Competitive salary and benefits. ● Opportunities to work on impactful EdTech projects. ● Professional development and training programs. ● Supportive and innovative team culture.Apply with full confidence: hr@alnafi.edu.pkJob Type: Full-timeWork Location: In personApplication Deadline: 31/01/2025Expected Start Date: 05/02/2025

Job descriptionJob Summary:We are seeking a Full-Stack Node JS Developer with solid JavaScript (Angular, React) and Node JS knowledge and strong technical expertise to join our rapidly growing technology team. As member of a strong, collaborative application development team, this individual will be responsible for design, architecture, development and maintenance of our e-commerce projects.Job Detail:Functi...onal Area: Software DevelopmentTotal Position: 1Job Type: PermanentShift: Day shift (9AM – 6PM)Education Level: Bachelors / MastersCareer Level: ExperiencedExperience required: 2 yearsRequire Travel: NoJob Location: Karachi, PakistanJob Description:• Full-stack experience, using server-side frameworks like Node.JS – a must have.• Production experience with modern UI frameworks like ReactJS / AngularJS.• Experience in document-based NoSQL databases like Cassandra/MongoDB.• Experience in Agile and DevOps delivery models.• Experience developing HTTP, data representation with JSON, and RESTFul Application Programming Interfaces (APIs).• Experience developing with prototype frameworks (Bootstrap, Foundation, etc.).• Deep understanding of cross-browser/platform issues and code solutions.• Hands-on experience with developer daily basis tools such as IDE’s, compilers, debuggers, profilers, version control .systems, bug tracking systems, build systems, code coverage and automated testing tools.• Passionate about customer focus, with the understanding of business impact to drive the system improvements.• Ability to translate requirements and mockups into fully functioning websites using HTML/CSS/JS/.Company Intro:Established in 2011, IT Verticals has grown slowly but gradually to its current strength of 40. With two offices; Headquarter in Tampa, Florida (USA) and offshore development center in Karachi, Pakistan, we offer software development and business process offshore capabilities to our clients located in United States.Job Type: Full-timeWork Location: In person

Job descriptionCrossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, Trilogy. Have you got what it takes?Are you a talented software engineer passionate about using AI to transform the telecom industry? Join our team and work on revolutionary solutions that enable service providers to monetize their networks f...aster, scale effortlessly, and deliver exceptional customer experiences.In this role, you’ll focus on building and optimizing Charging-as-a-Service, a groundbreaking, cloud-native platform designed to modernize telecom charging systems. You’ll develop a highly scalable, multi-tenant charging engine capable of handling global transaction volumes, enabling service providers to go from setup to monetization in record time. Additionally, you’ll create tools that use natural language processing and machine learning to design, test, and launch new plans with unprecedented speed and precision.This is your opportunity to be at the forefront of AI-driven innovation in telecom, shaping the future of charging and network monetization.What you can expect from the application process:• Quick check: Answer a few questions to confirm basic qualifications.• Prove your potential: Complete a 15-minute cognitive assessment (Criteria CCAT) to demonstrate your learning agility.• Showcase your skills: Solve real-world coding challenges, including feature development, AI integration, and bug resolution.• Connect with leadership: Attend a 30-minute interview with our Engineering leadership team.This process takes about 5 hours, and you can complete it at your own pace. We value your time, providing assessment results within 48 hours and interview decisions within 3 business days.Are you ready to take on this challenge? We’re building the future of telecom with AI as our compass.What you will be doing• Developing and deploying Charging-as-a-Service, focusing on scalability, performance, and reliability.• Designing serverless, cloud-native applications to modernize telecom charging systems.• Building tools powered by natural language processing and machine learning to streamline plan creation and management.• Leveraging cutting-edge AI tools to enhance development efficiency and tackle complex technical challenges.• Collaborating with a global team to deliver high-quality, enterprise-grade solutions.What you won’t be doing• Routine Monotony: We keep cumbersome infrastructure tasks to a minimum so you can focus on creating innovative solutions.• Endless Meetings: We value your expertise in development over sitting in meeting rooms. Expect more coding, less talking.AI-First Software Engineer II key responsibilities• Build and optimize telecom charging solutions that enable rapid monetization and limitless scalability.• Implement AI-driven features to streamline workflows and empower service providers with innovative tools.Basic Requirements• 4+ years of experience in software development, focusing on production code for server-side web applications.• 2+ years as the primary technical contributor to a software product’s development.• Hands-on experience with cloud-native development or serverless architectures.• Proficiency in Java, TypeScript, and SQL, with familiarity in Golang, C++, or similar languages.• Strong experience with Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC), CI/CD, and AWS.• Telecom industry experience or hands-on work with telco systems, products, or software.• Familiarity with AI-driven tools like Copilot, Cursor, or ChatGPT.• Exposure to Python or willingness to learn new programming languages with AI tools.About TrilogyHundreds of software businesses run on the Trilogy Business Platform. For three decades, Trilogy has been known for 3 things: Relentlessly seeking top talent, Innovating new technology, and incubating new businesses. Our technological innovation is spearheaded by a passion for simple customer-facing designs. Our incubation of new businesses ranges from entirely new moon-shot ideas to rearchitecting existing projects for today's modern cloud-based stack. Trilogy is a place where you can be surrounded with great people, be proud of doing great work, and grow your career by leaps and bounds.

Job description• Good experience in Flask, FastAPI.• Has a good understanding of RDBMS (PostgreSQL preferred) and NoSql.• Hands-on experience and knowledge of Test-driven development• Experience with the following AWS services EC2, SQS, Lambda, S3, etc.• Having an idea about DevOps, CI/CD and Terraform is a plus.• Experience working in adaptive software development lifecycle (Scrum Framework).• Familiarity... with ORM (Object Relational Mapping) libraries, and Migration tools.• Experience with big data technologies such as Kafka, Spark, and others is a plus.• Expertise in Docker or other containerization software.• Working knowledge of Messaging technologies e.g. RabbitMQ.• Good knowledge of distributed SOA, Web Services, Relational DB concepts, Elastic Search, DynamoDB, and various AWS technologies.• Preferably experience in using security, encryption, and authentication protocols such as SSO, and OAuth.How to Apply:Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their resume and a cover letter outlining their relevant experience and qualifications to jobs@q-sols.com. Job descriptionSenior Software Engineer (Angular/.NET/MSSQL)Company Overview: Join our dynamic and growing organization committed to engineering best practices and continuous professional growth. As a Software Engineer, you will play a crucial role in a cross-functional product team, contributing to the development of new features and the enhancement of existing ones.Primary Responsibilities:• Work collabor...atively in two-week sprints using technologies like C#, ASP.NET Web API, Angular, and MsSQL.• Conduct full stack design and development with a focus on maintainability, usability, scalability, and performance.• Positively influence the team through design reviews and collaboration with fellow developers.• Work closely with product managers to architect the platform optimally in line with future business directions.• Collaborate with technical leads and stakeholders for project and resource planning.• Contribute ideas to evolve CI/CD processes and tools.• Stay informed about industry trends in web technologies, .NET, microservices, cloud computing (AWS), and automated unit testing.• Participate actively in engineering guilds, focus groups, and tech talks to explore and implement new technologies, tools, and architectural patterns.Required Knowledge/Skills/Abilities:• Bachelor's degree in computer engineering, Computer Science, or equivalent discipline.• 4 years of relevant work experience.• 2 years working with Boilerplate ABP Framework.• Excellent knowledge of OOP concepts and Microsoft platforms (e.g., .Net Framework, C#, ASP.NET Core, Web API, MVC, SQL Server).• Experience and knowledge in Software Architecture and Design, release management, and DDD.• Strong experience in Event-driven architecture, CQRS & Background jobs.• Familiarity with Hangfire, RabbitMQ/Azure Event bus, AWS S3, Kibana & Elasticsearch, Prometheus, Grafana, Redis.• Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git, and DevOps.• Strong understanding of the DOM, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES5 and ES2015+).• Significant experience with Angular (8x-16) and additional web libraries and frameworks.• Experience with front-end tooling workflows: Node.js (NPM), SASS/SCSS, WebPack, Angular-CLI.• Experience testing JavaScript (Angular) code — Jasmine and Protractor preferred but not required.• Experience with Responsive Web Design (RWD) patterns.• Proven ability to create working prototypes using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.• Full-stack awareness, with a focus on front-end development.• Experience with data integration in an Agile environment.• Strong team-building, vendor, and customer relations skills.• GIT and GitHub proficiency.• Strong communication skills for wireframes, rapid prototypes, PoCs, and whiteboarding.• Experience building and maintaining a reusable components library.How to Apply: If you are passionate about software development and thrive in a collaborative environment, we invite you to apply. Send your resume and a cover letter detailing your relevant experience atPlease include "Software Engineer Application" in the subject line.We are an equal opportunity employer. We encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds and experiences.Job Type: Full-timeSalary: Rs200,000.00 - Rs300,000.00 per monthExperience:• .Net Core: 4 years (Preferred)

Job descriptionJob Title: Lead Software Engineer (Angular)Experience Level: 5+ yearsJob Type: Onsite, Full-timeJob Summary:As a Lead Angular Developer, you will be responsible for leading the development and implementation of dynamic, scalable, and high-performance web applications. Your expertise in Angular will help drive technical excellence and innovative solutions while mentoring junior developers a...nd collaborating with cross-functional teams.Key Responsibilities• Design, develop, and maintain complex web applications using Angular.• Lead the implementation of responsive and user-friendly interfaces.• Optimize application performance for scalability and efficiency.• Collaborate with backend teams to integrate APIs and ensure seamless functionality.• Provide technical guidance, code reviews, and mentorship to junior developers.• Stay updated on the latest Angular and frontend technologies, and recommend improvements.• Write and maintain comprehensive documentation and ensure adherence to best practices.Qualifications• Bachelor's degree in computer science, Engineering, or a related field.• 5+ years of professional experience in Angular development.• Strong knowledge of Angular (latest versions), TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and SCSS.• Expertise in integrating RESTful APIs and handling asynchronous operations.• Proficiency in debugging, unit testing, and optimizing front-end applications.• Familiarity with UI/UX tools like Figma for implementing designs.• Strong problem-solving, analytical, and communication skills.• Experience working in Agile development environments is a plus.• Proficiency in using state management libraries such as NgRx or Akita to manage complex state in Angular applications efficiently.• Knowledge of software design patterns and best practices specific to frontend development, such as component-based architecture, reactive programming, and modular design.Preferred skills:Familiarity with cloud services (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and their integration with Angular applications.Understanding of DevOps practices and containerization with Docker.

Job descriptionLead Full Stack DeveloperJob Description:We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate should have 4-5 years of experience in application development, with a strong background in both front-end and back-end technologies. software solutions.Key Responsibilities:• Lead the design, development, and deployment of scalable web applications using the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack.• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, product managers, and other developers, to define, design, and deliver new features.• Optimise applications for performance, scalability, and security to ensure seamless user experiences.• Design, implement, and maintain database architectures and operations using MongoDB.• Mentor and guide junior developers by reviewing their code, providing constructive feedback, and enforcing development best practices.• Manage the entire software development life cycle, including planning, coding, testing, deployment, and post-deployment support.• Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies, frameworks, and industry trends to incorporate innovative solutions and enhance project outcomes.Qualifications and Skills:• Proven experience in full stack development with expertise in the MERN stack.• Strong understanding of software design principles, data structures, and algorithms.• Proficiency in front-end development with React.js, including state management libraries (e.g., Redux or Context API).• Hands-on experience with back-end technologies, including Node.js, Express.js, and API development.• Proficiency in MongoDB, including schema design and performance optimization.• Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines.• Familiarity with cloud services and deployment strategies (e.g., AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud).• Excellent problem-solving skills and a proactive approach to identifying and addressing challenges.• Strong communication and collaboration skills.Preferred Qualifications:• Experience in mentoring and leading development teams.• Familiarity with DevOps practices and containerisation (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).NOTE:Location: KarachiWorking Days: Monday to FridayJob Type: Full Time / HybridJob Type: Full-time

Job description[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]We are looking for a front end/WordPress developer to join us on a full-time basis.Our ideal candidate is a generalist developer with a visual sensibility and a deep understanding of front end fundamentals. Beyond writing beautiful CSS, we’re looking for someone who is interested in solving real business problems with code. To get a clear idea of what you could... be working on, take a look at our work.Responsibilities:• Building digital products like websites, micro sites, web applications, interactive visualizations and apps for a broad range of clients• Maintaining code from planning to building through testing, deployment and updates• Delivering either just the front end or the CMS portion of a project in collaboration with another developer, or delivering the whole project• Working closely with UX and creative directors, designers, developers, and other specialists to estimate and deliver projectsAbout you:• Motivated to learn about your craft• Passionate about clean, maintainable code• Interested in a user’s actual experience as much as code passing tests• A visual thinker who cares about quality and design• Obsessed with performance• Confident in communicating your ideas and able to collaborate and discuss work with designersRequired skills and experience:• 3+ years’ working experience• Ability to accurately turn prototypes and mockups into living interfaces and ask the right questions as they’re designed• Deep knowledge of CSS and SASS• Ability to work with common CMS systems and frameworks depending on the need – common platforms like WordPress or Squarespace, or spinning up a lightweight custom solution• Good JavaScript knowledge – you can traverse the DOM, plus you know when a library is useful vs. when it’s not• Comfortable with Git and the command line• An eye for detailsGreat skills to have• Front end framework skills• Headless CMS skills e.g., Gatsby• Data visualization skills• UI designHow to ApplyPlease send your resume and some work samples to careers@pinease.com.Pinease Technologies believes that diversity and inclusion among our teammates is critical to our success. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants are considered without regard to ancestry, citizenship, ethnicity, race, colour, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, record of offences, sex or sexual orientation, genetics, creed, disability, age, family status, marital status, or veteran status.Pilot PMR welcomes and encourages applications from people with disabilities. Accommodations are available on request for qualified and selected candidates taking part in the selection process.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

Job descriptionCompany DescriptionAlpha Mu Digital Ventures is an offshore and outsourcing company which was founded with the goal of solving the greatest challenge offshore teams, ensuring quality of output. All candidates work with an experienced mentor who can help guide them and ensure that their output is in line with our clients expectations.Job DescriptionWe are looking for a Front-End Web Developer... who is skilled in development of modernangular apps. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX designwireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You willwork with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design andtechnical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how theapplication looks as well as how it works.Qualifications• Bachelors degree in computer science or a similar discipline• 2+ years of experience working in a relevant role after graduation.• Develop and maintain our Angular web apps that cater for features administrative dashboards, user management, reports.• Ensure technical feasibility of UI/UX designs• Work with the backend team to design data schema requirements• Build reusable code and libraries for future use• Optimise application for maximum speed and scalability• Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end• Collaborate with other team members and stakeholdersAdditional Information• Proficient in Angular, Typescript, and Material UI concepts• Proficient understanding of web mark-up, including HTML5, CSS3• Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS• Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks• Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX• Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image• Familiarity with tools such as as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus• Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them• Proficient understanding of code versioning tools• Good understanding of SEO principles and ensuring that application will adhere to them

Job descriptionWhat You’ll Do• Create lighting fast responsive landing pages using HTML/CSS and Bootstrap by translating provided design mockups.• Maintain web standards and keep up-to-date with new technologies and advertising trends and formats (i.e. site responsiveness, size restrictions, mobile, web video, etc.)• Develop front-end code variations for A/B testing using HTML, CSS and JavaScript.• Along wit...h landing and homepages, other requests will inevitably come your way including interactive info graphics, microsites, new interactive form flows and overall page innovations.• Brainstorm, concept, and collaborate with the Creative Team• Work with the content team to implement SEO best practices and all analytics code• Work closely with back-end developers, Marketing team and web designers to improve usability of Website• Proficiency with JavaScript libraries (jQuery, DataTables) and modern frameworks (React, Redux, Angular, Backbone, etc.) to enhance user interfaceTechnical Skill Set• 2-3 years of relevant experience• Capable of using HTML, CSS & jQuery to create rich interactive and animated content• Familiarity with software like Adobe Suite, Photoshop and content management systems• Familiar with interacting with third-party APIs• Deep understanding of front-end and back-end of WordPress• Familiar with Ajax, PHP and MySQL• Deep understanding of web standard and best practices• In-depth understanding of the entire web development process (design, development and deployment)• Familiarity with browser testing and debugging• Strong Understanding of layout aesthetics• Working knowledge of .NET applications development would be advantage• Excellent analytical and multitasking skills• BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field• Excellent English written and verbal communication skillsWhat You’ll Need• Leadership on demand. We expect you to take the lead wherever you deem necessary without anybody having to push you to it. At the same time, you should know when working as a team is more beneficial for the company.• Manic energy. You need to come in charging each day and be ready to take the bull by the horns. Tiredness should be a foreign concept to you.• Competitive nature. Being the best shouldn’t be enough for you. You make your goals, you crush them, and you lead the rest in doing the same every single time.• Learner mindset. You need to be raring to learn something new each day. Your workday should feel incomplete if you haven’t learned at least 10 new things.• The 3Cs: Courage, Curiosity, and Creativity.

Job descriptionAbout ContourContour Software has grown from a dozen people to over 2,000 staff across 3 cities, in less than 14 years.As a subsidiary of Constellation Software Inc., we are proud to be part of a global enterprise software conglomerate that has grown to become one of the top 10 software companies in the world, with employees and customers in 100+ countries. With a broad-based and ever-growing ...portfolio of market-leading, vertical-market enterprise solutions covering more than 100 industry domains in predominantly mature markets, CSI's recipe creates the perfect environment for professionals to build fulfilling, long-term careers.What started as an R&D & Accounting back-office, has progressed into a full-service Global Centre serving all functions and departments, at the divisional as well as operating group/corporate level. Today Contour employees, located in Karachi, Lahore & Islamabad, are serving CSI divisions located in time zones spanning the globe, from Sydney to Vancouver. With the global growth of Constellation as the wind in our sails, we are only just getting started!The DivisionOwner Relations, a division of Jonas Software (an operating group of Constellation Software Inc.) provides robust Condo Hotel Software, Owner Accounting and Owner Portal software solutions for Condo Hotels, Fractional Hotels, Residence Clubs, Timeshare Resorts, HOA's and Property Management Companies.The chosen individual will work out of the Contour Software Islamabad/Lahore/Karachi resource center office, as an extension of the division-based R&D department.The PositionWe are looking for an Software Developer with an expertise in developing robust and scalable solutions using .Net.Responsibilities• Hands-on software development experience in an agile environment.• Identify the impact of possible implementation options.• Troubleshoot and fix customer tickets.• Create and maintain unit tests.• Performance improvement and refactoring of legacy code.• Work within deadlines in relation to product release timelines, and consistently complete assigned development tasks in required timeframes.• Follow and contribute to software development processes and standards.• Highlight task-level issues and risks as appropriate and assist in finding solutions.Desired Skills And Responsibilities• Bachelor’s degree in information systems, Computer Engineering, or equivalent technical Degree; or equivalent combination of education and experience.• Must have 3+ years of industry experience in building enterprise applications using VB.Net and ASP.Net Web Forms.• Excellent knowledge of Object-Oriented Programming.• Excellent knowledge of Relational Databases especially MS SQL Server.• Good experience of building and working with WCF or REST APIs.• Good knowledge of software development best practices.• Excellent, effective, and clear written and oral communication skills.• Proven ability to resolve complex problems in a pragmatic fashion.• Self-motivated, resourceful, and keen to learn and share knowledge.Nice To HaveKnowledge of the following:• Angular• JavaScript/ECMAScriptDisclaimer: At Contour, we attribute our success to the unique contributions of our diverse staff. We’re committed to fostering a culture of respect that thrives on the varied perspectives and experiences of all individuals we recruit, employ, promote, and compensate. Since day one, we’ve adhered to a policy that champions a work environment honoring the worth and dignity of each person while being free from all forms of employment discrimination.In our continuous effort to promote inclusivity, we extend our commitment to individuals with special needs by providing reasonable accommodations. We actively encourage qualified individuals with special needs to apply for the various openings within our company. Should you require assistance in completing the application process or have any inquiries regarding special facilities, please do not hesitate to contact our HR team. Your unique talents and abilities are welcomed and valued here.

Job descriptionSecuriti has been widely recognized as an industry innovator, being named “Most Innovative Start-up” at RSA Conference 2020, Leader in the IDC Marketplace, Leader in the Forrester Wave Privacy Management Software, and winner of the 2020 HPE-IAPP Innovation Award. The company is being built by proven serial entrepreneurs and executives who have successfully built and scaled high-growth global compa...nies before. We are now expanding our development team and have multiple backend development roles open. If you aspire to work on cutting-edge technologies and frameworks, side by side with some of the smartest technologists, this may be a unique place for you. You will be working as a part of a distributed agile team, building a new SaaS platform that underpins a suite of enterprise applications solving a variety of hard data analytics and enterprise problems.Responsibilities• Be a part of a globally distributed team of backend engineers to design/develop/architect Securiti’s core backend platform• Help create architecture documents, functional specifications, design documents, and developer test plans• Coordinate end-to-end development, deployment, and testing of new features and enhancements in the product• Write reliable, secure, performant, and scalable code• Perform code reviews and analysis• Monitor platform performance and be on-call to address any urgent issues• Work with customer support and address customer issues• Integrate new technologies into back-end cloud infrastructureRequirements• Minimum 2 years experience developing software, with some experience using container technologies like Docker• Strong conceptual understanding of multi-threaded applications• Professional development experience in GoLang, Java, C++, or Python• Good knowledge of Linux and bash scripting• Good software development practices: should thrive in an environment of rapid development, peer code reviews, and write good functional/unit tests• Experience with microservices and REST-based HTTP/2 architectures• Experience with SQL (Postgres) and NoSQL (Mongo/Elasticsearch) technologies• Knowledge and use of performance tuning, profiling, and software metrics tools• Very strong diagnostic and troubleshooting skills• Understanding of continuous integration tools, including Jenkins• Experience with agile development methodologies is a must• Outstanding verbal, written, and interpersonal communication skills• High level of energy, teamwork, can-do attitude, and willingness to learn new technologies• Working knowledge of networks and web conceptsBonus points• Experience in building highly available and scalable distributed systems for the cloud is required for senior roles• Proven ability to utilize creative thinking to solve complex engineering problems• Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, and Azure• Experience with Containerisation technologies (Kubernetes, Docker)• Experience with tools like terraform, helm, docker• Understanding of Network Services such as Load-Balancers, Security, QoS• Understanding of platform level concerns, such as configuration management, network request routing, blue/green or canary deployments, in-service software upgrade• Experience in building API based connectors to cloud-based SaaS services is a big plusAbout UsSecuriti solves challenges across governance, privacy, and security. With a foundation in data understanding and a team that was responsible for developing and deploying the market-leading CASB & DLP technology, we were able to create a platform from the ground up that leverages automation and workflows to solve complex privacy, data, and security business challenges with a simplified interface promoting collaboration across the business. Ease of use, quick to deploy and customizable are all reasons why companies select Securiti versus stitching multiple vendors together to address their challenges.The exponential growth of data brings massive new opportunities but also brings increasingly perilous security, compliance, and privacy risks. At Securiti, our mission is to enable organizations to safely harness the incredible power of data and the cloud by controlling the complex security, compliance, and privacy risks. Securiti’s solution uniquely combines AI-powered data intelligence with full workflow automation, simplifying compliance with GDPR, CCPA, LGPD, and other regulations. Granular insights into structured and unstructured data enable organizations to monitor risk, control access, and protect sensitive data at scale.

Job descriptionAre you on the hunt for exciting new challenges that boost your professional growth? If you’re a Java Developer by trade, we’d love to hear from you! Read on to see if you’d be a good fit for the Scopic team of 250+ professionals from over 40 countries.At Scopic, the virtual world is our home so this is a full-time remote position. Only apply if you’re prepared for the zero-hour commute and the ...thought of collaborating with colleagues from around the globe excites you!The skills and traits we’re looking for:• 3+ years of hands-on experience with Java server-side development• Experience with the architectural patterns of large, high-scale web applications• Understanding of the common design patterns and engineering practices• Experience of working with at least one modern build system• Solid knowledge of common algorithms and data structures• Strong knowledge of at least one major *NIX platform (Linux, OS/X, FreeBSD, etc.)• Experience with some or all of these libraries and technologies is a plus: Jetty, Jersey, Jackson, JDBI, Hibernate, MongoDB, MySQL, Postgres, ActiveMQ, RabbitMQ, Kafka, ElasticSearchWhat your day-to-day will look like:• Design, develop, and architect services for the project• Contribute to cutting-edge R&D initiatives including service integration with emerging frameworks and platforms• Assist with technical resolution of issues on mission-critical production systems (you build it, you own it, you run it)The secret ingredients that make us special:• Your growth is our growth. We invest in your future with paid training and other professional opportunities.• We’re industry innovators at the forefront of change. Equipped with the latest technologies and a team of knowledgeable colleagues by your side, you’ll embrace new and interesting challenges.• Your location. Your schedule — Pick your time-zone, choose your preferred hours, and work from the place where you feel most at home.• Flexibility and freedom are in our DNA! As long as you have a stable internet connection and the drive to thrive, you can travel and work from anywhere you like.• A workload you can rely on. We’ll set you enough tasks to keep that mind busy! At Scopic, we’ll ensure you always have a consistent flow of engaging, challenging work to do.• Recognition and reward. We acknowledge diligence and hard work through annual pay increases for good performance.Down to business!• Salary Range: Your starting salary is negotiable depending on your skills and experience.• Both hourly and salary positions are available.• Employees are paid monthly via wire transfer.Our values:Scopic is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, marital status, national origin, gender, veteran status, sexual orientation, age, or disability status.Have the skills, the drive, and the passion to join the Scopic family? Apply today to join our growing team of remote professionals from around the world.#J-18808-Ljbffr

Job description📈 Opportunity in a company with a solid track record of performance🏡 🖥️ Remote friendly work culture🚀 Rapid career advancement with opportunities to learn💰 Competitive salary and Performance bonus🏝👨⚕️ Paid time off & Medical insurance• Learning the basics of Esevel platform and functions• Daily team discussions to understand project functionality and collaboration skills• Develop... additional features to the platform, while learning about new Laravel features and coding skills• Collaborate with other developers in code reviews, learn from mistakes, and improve coding ethics and workflows used by the team• Fix bottlenecks and performance issues in existing code, while learning code optimizations• Use best practices to ensure scalable and manageable codebase in large projects• Good Communication skills: Should be able to converse freely in English• Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, completed between January 2023 -> December 2023• Minimum 6 months of experience in developing at least one Laravel project• Current/Last project worked on should be Laravel based• Basic understanding of REST API, Eloquent, and other Laravel features• Basic knowledge of design patterns and why they are used• Basic knowledge of at least one Database system like MySQL, PostgreSQL, or similar• Problem-solving skills: able to use all possible resources to find solutions to problemsEsevel’s end to end IT management platform helps small to medium businesses secure and support their people, devices and applications throughout Asia.Many companies in Asia hire people outside of their borders, and give them the flexibility to work out of the office, their homes or even co-working spaces, as the situation demands. But this blended and fluid workforce is only possible if you can mitigate the increased security risks and operational demands of supporting a distributed workforce. The truth is most small and medium businesses do not have the tools to stay on top of this trend. And most managed service providers (MSPs) have fallen behind this new world of work. That’s why we have made it our mission to make IT easier for you. We thrive on taking care of your team’s IT security and day-to-day operational needs. And we do so throughout 8 countries in the Asia-Pacific region. Now you can focus on growing your business and taking it to the next level.

Job descriptionOur UK-based client is hiring in the regional office located at DHA Phase 2 Karachi.Working Model: Hybrid (Very flexible)Job Role:We are looking for an experienced Business Intelligence Lead Developer to join our fast-paced organization. If you want to work for a company where you can utilize your creativity, analytical skills, and organizational abilities, we want you. A successful candidat...e must have experience in software development and database development and must be able to work well in a team setting.Responsibilities:• Perform ETL and ELT processes to load data into storage.• Design tables, views, and stored procedures or work with database administrators to create database tables, views and stored procedures.• Implement data validation routines to ensure data quality.• Maintain business rules and ensure data accuracy.• Review feature requests and make appropriate recommendations to senior management on feasibility and need for features.Implement business intelligence applications which include reporting, querying, and analytical capabilities based on the technical architecture.Experience:• SQL: 5 years• Data Warehouse: 3 years (Preferred), including development (from scratch) of a new Data Warehouse based on a Transactional RDBMS.• SQL Analysis Services: 3 years or more (preferred)• Proficient with Microsoft Report Builder (or comparable tool) to create reports from the Data Warehouse• Proficient with Power BI (or comparable tool) to create analytical reports and dashboards• Proficient with Multi-dimensional and Tabular cube models• Experience with MDX and DAX querying languages• Able to debug issues related to• ETL / ELT processes,• Cube Load processes• Experience with data modeling (OLTP and OLAP)• Able to describe Data Warehouse schema concepts (star/snowflake schemas, and use of Report Builder to junior BI Developers.• Experience with Data Vault 2.0 warehousing architecture

Job descriptionAbout the Role:We are seeking experienced Full Stack Developers with 5-6 years of hands-on experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have expertise in both frontend and backend development, working on scalable web applications and ensuring seamless user experiences.Key Responsibilities:- Develop, test, and maintain robust web applications.- Design and implement scalable... backend services and APIs.- Optimize front-end performance for better user experience.- Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers and product managers.- Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing applications.- Stay updated with emerging technologies and best practices.Technical Requirements:- Frontend: React.js / Angular / Vue.js, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript.- Backend: Node.js, Python (Django/Flask), Java (Spring Boot), or .NET Core.- Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB.- Cloud & DevOps: AWS / Azure / Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD.- Version Control: Git, GitHub/GitLab.- Other: RESTful APIs, GraphQL, Microservices Architecture.If you are passionate about full-stack development and eager to work on innovative projects, we’d love to hear from you!Job Type: Full-timePay: From Rs90,000.00 per monthExperience:• Full Stack: 5 years (Preferred)Work Location: In person

Job description🚀 We’re Hiring: Full-Stack Next.js Developer (Frontend + Backend)Company: The Dev StudioJob Type: Full-Time (Part-time start possible)Experience: Minimum 2 yearsSalary: PKR 2 lacs – 3 lacs/month (plus benefits)About the RoleWe’re looking for a Next.js developer who can work across both frontend and backend, handling everything from API development to crafting high-performance UIs. If ...PostgreSQL with Prisma is your go-to stack, and you love solving complex problems, this opportunity is for you!🔹 But wait! We need a problem solver. A puzzle awaits below – crack it and mention your answer in the application email, or else your application won’t be considered.What We’re Looking ForWe need someone who can own Next.js projects, both on the frontend and backend. Your skillset should include:• Next.js for developing scalable applications.• PostgreSQL and Prisma ORM for efficient database management.• RESTful API and GraphQL development.• Tailwind CSS for crafting responsive UIs.• Bonus: Familiarity with Windsurf or Cursor editor using GPT Pro.Key Responsibilities• Develop and maintain Next.js applications with a focus on performance.• Optimize PostgreSQL databases with Prisma ORM.• Write efficient and well-documented code.• Collaborate with the design and product teams.• Debug, troubleshoot, and enhance performance.Perks and Benefits✅ Competitive Salary: PKR 2 lacs – 3 lacs/month.✅ Medical Benefits: Coverage for the candidate.✅ Annual Leave: Two weeks of paid leave per year.✅ Growth Opportunities: Yearly salary reviews and career development.✅ Company Laptop: A fully provided work laptop.✅ Flexible Start: Begin part-time and transition to full-time.🧩 Here’s Your ChallengeYour application must include the correct answer to this puzzle to be considered:"You are given a database table called Users with columns id (PK), name, and email.A user can only change their email once every 30 days.Write a PostgreSQL query to find all users who have changed their email more than once in the last 90 days."(Hint: Think about JOIN or window functions in PostgreSQL!)📩 Email your resume, portfolio, puzzle answer to syed at thedevstudio.net with the subject line:"Next.js Developer Application - [Your Full Name]"🚀 Looking forward to finding the best talent in Karachi!
